item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C03G066100 Gene Symbol: ACS7 Gene Name: carboxylate synthase 7 Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: An allelic variant in the ACS7 gene promotes primary root growth in watermelon。 The ACS7 expression and ethylene levels in the primary root tips suggested that ethylene is a negative regulator of root elongation in watermelon.

item.title: CmERF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmERF4 Gene Name: ERF VIIIa 4 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: A group VIIIa ethylene-responsive factor, CmERF4, negatively regulates waterlogging tolerance in chrysanthemum.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmERF5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmERF5-CmRAP2.

item.title: CmHSFA4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmHSFA4 Gene Name: heat-shock factor A4 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum CmHSFA4 gene positively regulates salt stress tolerance in transgenic chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmLOX08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C011885 Gene Symbol: CmLOX08 Gene Name: Lipoxygenase 8 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Cloned the CmLOX08 promoter of melon (Cucumis melo) and identified the main promoter regions regulating transcription in response to signalling molecules and abiotic stresses.

item.title: CmMYB121
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene68526-All Gene Symbol: CmMYB121 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 121 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CmHSFA4-CmMYBS3 complex enhances salt tolerance in chrysanthemum by repressing CmMYB121 expression.

item.title: CmMYBS3

item.title: CmNRRa

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MS.gene058705 Gene Symbol: MsLEA1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: These results indicate that MsLEA1 recruits and protects its target proteins (SOD and Ms1770) and increases alfalfa tolerance against drought and Al stresses.

item.title: MtNAC969
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtNAC969 Gene Name: NAC969 transcription factor Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Over-expression of one of these transcription factors, MtNAC969, induced formation of a shorter and less-branched root system, whereas RNAi-mediated MtNAC969 inactivation promoted lateral root formation.

item.title: MtSERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtSERF1 Gene Name: SOMATIC EMBRYO RELATED FACTOR1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor MtSERF1 of the ERF subfamily identified by transcriptional profiling is required for somatic embryogenesis induced by auxin plus cytokinin in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: MtST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g069810 Gene Symbol: MtST1 Gene Name: Specific Tissue 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Three members of Medicago truncatula ST family are ubiquitous during development and modulated by nutritional status (MtST1) and dehydration (MtST2 and MtST3).

item.title: MtST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr3g116440 Gene Symbol: MtST2 Gene Name: Specific Tissue 2 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Three members of Medicago truncatula ST family are ubiquitous during development and modulated by nutritional status (MtST1) and dehydration (MtST2 and MtST3).

item.title: MtZPT2-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MTR_1g106730 Gene Symbol: MtZPT2-2 Gene Name: C2H2 type ZFP Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The objectives of this study were to investigate the role of MtZPT2-2 from R108 in regulating salt tolerance using overexpressing lines and gene-edited mutants and the underlying mechanisms.

item.title: MusaDHN-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MusaDHN-1 Gene Name: SK3-type dehydrin Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: MusaDHN-1, a novel multiple stress-inducible SK3-type dehydrin gene, contributes affirmatively to drought- and salt-stress tolerance in banana.

item.title: MusaPIP1;2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MusaPIP1;2 Gene Name: Aquaporin PIP1-2 Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: Transgenic banana plants overexpressing a native plasma membrane aquaporin MusaPIP1;2 display high tolerance levels to different abiotic stresses.

item.title: MxHA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD08G1130200 Gene Symbol: MxHA2 Gene Name: plasma membrane (PM) H+-ATPase Genome: Species: Malus xiaojinensis Functional Descriptions: MxMPK6-2-mediated phosphorylation enhances the response of apple rootstocks to Fe deficiency by activating PM H+-ATPase MxHA2.

item.title: MxMPK6-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MxMPK6-2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus xiaojinensis Functional Descriptions: MxMPK6-2-bHLH104 interaction is involved in reactive oxygen species signaling in response to iron deficiency in apple rootstock.

item.title: NbCML30

item.title: NtbHLH123

item.title: NtCP1

item.title: NtCP2

item.title: NtERF172
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtERF172 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Description: We propose that NtERF172 acts as a positive factor in drought stress tolerance, at least in part through the regulation of CAT-mediated H2O2 homeostasis.

item.title: PbrWRKY53
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr018725.1 Gene Symbol: PbrWRKY53 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 53 Genome: Species: Pyrus betulaefolia Functional Descriptions: A WRKY transcription factor PbrWRKY53 from Pyrus betulaefolia is involved in drought tolerance and AsA accumulation.

item.title: PdePHT1:9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.005G256100.1 Gene Symbol: PdePHT1:9 Gene Name: Pi transporter (PHT) Genome: Species: Populus deltoides × Populus euramericana Functional Descriptions: A gene encoding a Pi transporter (PHT), PdePHT1:9, was identified as the direct downstream target of PdeWRKY65 by RNA sequencing (RNA-Seq).

item.title: PdeWRKY6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.002G228400.1 Gene Symbol: PdeWRKY6 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 6 Genome: Species: Populus deltoides × Populus euramericana Functional Descriptions: A second WRKY TF, PdeWRKY6, was subsequently identified and confirmed to positively regulate the expression of PdePHT1:9 by DNA–protein interaction assays.

item.title: PdeWRKY65
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.011G070100.1 Gene Symbol: PdeWRKY65 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 65 Genome: Species: Populus deltoides × Populus euramericana Functional Descriptions: Identify a WRKY transcription factor (TF) in poplar (Populus deltoides × Populus euramericana) (PdeWRKY65) that modulates tissue phosphate (Pi) concentrations in poplar.

item.title: PeJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.006G139400 Gene Symbol: PeJAZ2 Gene Name: JASMONATE ZIM-domain protein 2 Genome: Species: Populus euphratica Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of PeJAZ2 in poplar notably increased water deficit tolerance and WUE in both severe and mild drought stress by regulating ABA signaling rather than ABA synthesis.

item.title: PeOST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.003G084100 Gene Symbol: PeOST1 Gene Name: OPEN STOMATA1 Genome: Species: Populus euphratica Functional Descriptions: A yeast two-hybrid assay was performed using PeOST1 as bait and a nucleus-localized factor, JASMONATE ZIM-domain protein 2 (PeJAZ2), was found to participate in MeJA signaling by interacting with PeOST1.

item.title: PeSTZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PeSTZ1 Gene Name: SALT TOLERANCE ZINC FINGER 1 Genome: Species: Populus euphratica Functional Descriptions: PeSTZ1, a C2H2-type zinc finger transcription factor from Populus euphratica, enhances freezing tolerance through modulation of ROS scavenging by directly regulating PeAPX2.

item.title: PtCBL10B

item.title: PtoERF15

item.title: PtoMYB142

item.title: PtoMYC2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.003G092200 Gene Symbol: PtoMYC2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Here, we identified and characterized an osmotic stress-induced ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 (PtoERF15) and its target, PtoMYC2b, which was involved in mediating vessel size, density, and cell wall thickness in response to drought in Populus tomentosa.

item.title: PtrABF

item.title: PtrABF
